--create topic testtopic;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    col2 int,
    col3 double,
    primary key (col0, col2)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3
    ),
    properties = (
        "prop1" = "val1",
        "prop2" = "val2"
    )
);
0 rows returned

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1 | col2        | col3                                                                     |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;
select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1 | col2        | col3                                                                     |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | 100  | 1000        | 1234.432100                                                              |
| 2                    | 200  | 2000        | 2234.432100                                                              |
| 3                    | 300  | 3000        | 3234.432100                                                              |
| 4                    | 400  | 4000        | 4234.432100                                                              |
| 5                    | 500  | 5000        | 5234.432100                                                              |
| 6                    | 600  | 6000        | 6234.432100                                                              |
| 7                    | 700  | 7000        | 7234.432100                                                              |
| 8                    | 800  | 8000        | 8234.432100                                                              |
| 9                    | 900  | 9000        | 9234.432100                                                              |
| 10                   | 1000 | 10000       | 10234.432100                                                             |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
10 rows returned

drop source test_source_1;
0 rows returned

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
Failed to execute statement: PDB0002 - Table 'test.test_source_1' doesn't exist

drop source test_source_1;
Failed to execute statement: PDB0005 - Unknown source: test.test_source_1

--delete topic testtopic;
